cause.description:
The Catholic Near East Welfare Association helps causes in Africa, Asia, Eastern Europe, and the Middle East that would otherwise fall through the cracks.
1. People deserve help regardless of religion.
2. "Preach the Gospel to all the world, and if necessary, use words."--St. Francis of Assisi
cause.mission: Help those in need in Africa, Eastern Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.
cause.name: Catholic Near East Welfare Association
